meanings.definition: A person who speaks harmful untruths about someone.
meanings.sent1: The maligner spread lies about his coworker to make them look bad.
meanings.sent2: She knew the maligner was trying to ruin her reputation with false stories.
meanings.sent3: The party was ruined when the maligner started gossiping about everyone.
meanings.sent4: The maligner's words were like poison, infecting the office with distrust.
meanings.sent5: Beware of the maligner, for their words can cause great harm.

meanings.sent3: The children giggled as they watched the parrot maligner the cat in the funny video.
meanings.sent4: Her words had the power to maligner his character in the eyes of others.
